page.title: 04Medomsley 60 Years ago.
page.content: The school 60 years ago was very uncomfortable because there was no heating,only a small coke stove.The desks were made of cast iron.The desks could be turned into a form.The cane was a punishment.The boys wore short trousers,a cap and a thick woollen jumper.The girls wore a blue dress. Medomsley pits occupied most of the village,employing{1000}miners.There was about{100}men going to and from the {3}shifts starting at 7am.There was a coal steam train going up to Consett every{30}mins.This closed in 1963. There was a large{Co-Op}where an old people's home is now.There were several shops,a butcher,a joiner,a baker,a draper,a blacksmith and a builder.Roads were dusty limestone not tarmac.If there was a wind it would be like a sandstorm.
